body.name: Teefeed iPhone Tripod, 54 inch Light Travel Tripod, with Mobile Phone Holder Adapter/Remote Shutter/Carry Bag for Selfie, Suitable for Video, Live Broadcast, Video Blog, Tiktok (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 53 mins
features: [MATRIAL & SCOPE OF USE] Lightweight aluminum material the gross weight of this cellphone tripod is only 1.26lbs(575g), easy to take on travel. Suitable for selfie, group photo, travel adventure, Vlogging, Youtube video, Blog, Facebook Live, FaceTime, Instagram, Live Stram, Tiktok

[STABILIZATION] The triangle-stable structure of this iPhone tripod can supports about 5lbs, which support iPhone/Samsung/Huawei and other smartphone even camera. Non-slip rubber footrest can be used even in uneven places.The flip buckle system have stronger locking force, which helps you release the tripod quickly

[ACCESSORIES] This new smartphone tripod campatible with nearly all kinds of cellphones. Our phone tripod adapter can be extend from 2 to 3.9 inch and allowed you rotating with 360 degrees. The Remote Shutter is compatible with Android and IOS system. It will help you take pictures up to 30 ft away

[DIMENSION] Folded height only 16 inch, the highest size is 54 inch. The tripod head can be pan at 360 degrees and tilt at 180 degrees. The standard 1/4 screw can hold lightweight dslr and slr (Please note that this tripod can not support for heavy camera)

[COMPATIBILITY] Our lightweight tripod can be compatible with iPhone15/14/13 /12/11/XS/Max/XR/X/8/7/SE/6S/6，Samsung Galaxy 23/22/S10/S10+/S10e/S9/S8/S7/S6/A9/A8/A7/A6/A5/A3/C9/C8/C7/C5, All Huawei mobilephones

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ---------1. Capture the fatastic moments---------------------- 2. Share your wonderful memories ---------------------3. Record beautiful life----------------

tripod adapter can be extend from 2 to 3.9 inch and allowed you rotating with 360 degrees With the standard 1/4 rivet the tripod can hold camera and lightweight SLR camera The flip buckle system have stronger locking force

Please notice: The shutter remote can only be used on one device at the same time. If you want to change the device to use, please delete AB Shutter 3 on the shutter remote setting page on the phone you are already using, so that the second device can be connected and used.

Product feature: Lightweight material with perfect craftsmanship.This portable travel tripod come with a newest cellphone adapter you can just use a cellphone to taking a elegant photos and videos Product Compatibility: The phone tripod adapter can be compatible with iPhone 14/13/12/11/XS/Max/XR/X/8/7/SE/MINI，Samsung Galaxy S22/S21/S20/S10/S9/S8/A9/A8/A7/A6/A5/A3/C9/C8/C7/C5, All Huawei mobile phones. With the standard 1/4 screw the tripod can hold camera and lightweight SLR camera Product Functions: The flip buckle system have stronger locking force, but easy to release.Just unlock the buckle and extend the tripod legs according to your needs.The length of the tripod legs can be adjust together or separately to keep the tripod stable and find a proper position Clip Function: Phone tripod adapter can be extend from 2 to 3.9 inch and allowed you rotating with 360 degrees Shutter remote: The iphone tripod remote is compatible with Android and iOS system.You can easily control the cellphone camera and it will help you taking selfies or group photos up to 30 ft away NOTE: This is a lightweight tripod, designed for lightweight devices.It will not suitable for heavy duty professional camcorders and cameras. Product Specifications Weight: 1.26 lbs Height: from 16 to 54 inches Material:Aluminum and ABS plastic Load Capacity: Less than 5 lbs Packing List 1 * Lightweight Tripod 1 *Shutter remote 1 * Cellphone Clip 1 * User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect tripod for filming with your iPhone
reviews.reviewText: This is a great lightweight and easy to use tripod. It matches it's description. I use it for filming my beach volleyball games and it's proven to be very durable as it's been smacked a few times with a ball and hasn't broken. It's also great for filming TikTok or Instagram reels if your an influencer hoping to film your content a little easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight but effective
reviews.reviewText: I'm very happy with it. The material does feel incredibly sturdy because its so light but it gets the job done. The remote is really handy, and overall everything is easy to set up. i love that it can be used at low and tall heights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new iPhone trie pod
reviews.reviewText: First I tried to cancel but once I opened the box I realized I had made the right purchase . Thank you for NOT canceling my order because being a 35mm old school photographer I can honestly say this is an Awesome tripod and nothing out there better .Just another extremely satisfied customer.Gain Thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I tested this out with my phone and it’s great. It’s easy to use and understand. It’s so lightweight that I was actually skeptical Lol but after I put my phone in it and adjusted all the dynamics, it was as sturdy as any other stand. It even has hook up for cameras and a remote that connects to your phone. Once it’s collapsed down, it small enough to carry with you anywhere. It comes with a black pouch with strings so that you can carry it. Definitely worth the purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I needed a lightweight tripod for my iPhone to carry on backpacking/trekking adventures, and this fit the bill. Very handy, easy to set up, and provides a nice stable base. I really like the Bluetooth remote as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, fits Iphone 12 pro max perfectly
reviews.reviewText: I really like this tripod, it fits my iphone 12 pro max with an Otter case perfectly. The remote works with both the still photo and video mode. Like others said it is nice that the phone holds the phone by screwing the holding parts together rather than the clamps that many other companies use. Somebody mentioned that you couldn't swivel the phone downwards to made a cooking video, but as you can see in the picture this worked just fine for me.
Es muy fácil de ensamblar e intuitivo y no tuve ningún problema en la compatibilidad del control bluetooth con mi cel (iphone 8 plus) y el envío fue muy rápido :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been using the tripod for some time now. Easy to adjust and althought it is quite cheap, the quality is good.
Bon rapport qualité prix. Assez costaud. Les pieds sont hauts donc parfait pour faire mes mes vidéos réseaux sociaux! Par contre je ne l’emmènerai pas en voyage, ça reste encombrant.
Värd pengarna. Lite vek i sin konstruktion, men passad perfekt för min iPhone.

reviews.reviewTitle: Schönes leichtes, stabiles Stativ! Kein Handy Selfie Stick!
reviews.reviewText: Ich war überrascht, wie leicht das Stativ ist (laut Küchenwaage 650 g incl. Handyhalterung) - da es einen sehr stabilen Eindruck macht, nichts wackelt - bekommt man ein wirklich solides, gut portables Stativ!Es ist aber nicht als Handy-Selfie-Stick verwendbar, was ja auch nicht in der Beschreibung steht - das war mein eigener Irrtum. Für jemanden, der ein leichtes, solides Stativ sucht - ideal.
